author: CHRIS BLAKE and SHEIKH SAALIQ Associated Press
title: India's 1.3 billion locked down as US reaches virus aid deal
description: The world's largest democracy is under the world's biggest lockdown, with India's 1.3 billion people ordered to stay home in a bid to stop the coronavirus
content:
NEW DELHI -- 
The world's largest democracy went under the world's biggest lockdown Wednesday, as India's 1.3 billion people stayed home in a bid to stop the march of the coronavirus pandemic. As infections and deaths rose in the U.S. and Europe, U.S. lawmak… [+6249 chars]
